content: inspired by the carnival boardwalks situated alongside the ocean this modern throw is perfect for a new baby a lapghan or a home décor accent stitch up a statement with geometric hexagons and graphic stripes the boardwalk hexie blanket is a colorwork piece using simple stitches and the intarsia method with intarsia there is no carrying of colors just drop your color and pick up the next one it also features a hexagon pattern created with filet crochet
